tool_description: Description: Stay updated with real-time climate change news from around the world using our Live Climate Change News Tracker API. Our API scrapes top news sources, including The Times, The Guardian, The Telegraph, The New York Times, and more, to provide you with the latest articles related to climate change. Explore headlines, article links, and their sources effortlessly. Stay informed about the evolving climate crisis with ease using our API.  Features:  Access climate change news article...
name: Live Climate Change News Tracker
title: Live Climate Change News Tracker

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source News
api_list.description: Returns news about climate change from a specific resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-climate-change-news-tracker.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-climate-change-news-tracker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-climate-change-news-tracker.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-climate-change-news-tracker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all news about climate change from all over the world.
